createUser:
function createUser(data):
    validate(data)
    newRecord = new User(data)
    id = database.save(newRecord)
    return id
updateUser:
function updateUser(id, data):
    validate(data)
    record = database.findById("User", id)
    if not record:
        return false
    record.update(data)
    database.save(record)
    return true
